welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Shenley Church End, a charming town located in the heart of the United Kingdom. Get ready to discover its picturesque surroundings, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and make unforgettable memories in our lovely city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Northampton Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Luton Airport is dedicated to low-cost carriers and budget airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium options are also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oxford (Kidlington) Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Oxford (Kidlington) Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport provides services for both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Benson Airport offers exclusive services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.
